row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
!Parameter declaration :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Directory" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Mode" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_MODE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Name" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME#
!Check EXT: of parameters
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Name" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Directory" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Mode" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_MODE#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
errors=0
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@UNIX EXISTTARGET=$EXIST if [ "$EXISTTARGET" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Target file/dir &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# does not exist" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER errors=1 fi
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@UNIX EXISTLINKDIR=$EXIST if [ "$EXISTLINKDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# where symbolic file should be created does not exist" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER errors=2 fi
:IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 exit 100 :ENDIF
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] ; then exit $errors fi
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
cd "&UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_LINK_COMMAND# = "ln "
:IF &UC4RB_FILE_MODE# = "SYMBOLIC" : SET &UC4RB_LINK_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_LINK_COMMAND#, " -s") :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_LINK_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_LINK_COMMAND#, ' "&UC4RB_FILE_TARGET#" "&UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME#"')
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create &UC4RB_FILE_MODE# link &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME# of &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# in &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
&UC4RB_LINK_COMMAND# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
